    com.penthera.exoplayer.com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.DrmSessionManager
    public class OfflineDrmSessionManager extends java.lang.Object implements com.penthera.exoplayer.com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.DrmSessionManager
    Manages a DRM session, retrieving stored keys for offline viewing.

    • Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Static Method and Description
      newWidevineInstance 
      static OfflineDrmSessionManager newWidevineInstance(android.content.Context context, android.os.Looper playbackLooper, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionalKeyRequestParameters, android.os.Handler eventHandler, OfflineDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener, java.lang.String assetUuid)
      Retrieve a Widevine Drm Manager instance
      public static OfflineDrmSessionManager newWidevineInstance(android.content.Context context, android.os.Looper playbackLooper, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionalKeyRequestParameters, android.os.Handler eventHandler, OfflineDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener, java.lang.String assetUuid) throws com.penthera.exoplayer.com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.UnsupportedDrmException
      Retrieve a Widevine Drm Manager instance
      Parameters:
      context - The context used for retrieving the offline keys.
      playbackLooper - The looper associated with the media playback thread. Should usually be obtained using com.google.android.exoplayer.ExoPlayer#getPlaybackLooper().
      optionalKeyRequestParameters - An optional map of parameters to pass as the last argument to MediaDrm.getKeyRequest(byte[], byte[], String, int, HashMap). May be null.
      eventHandler - A handler to use when delivering events to eventListener. May be null if delivery of events is not required
      eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
      assetUuid - The uuid of the asset that needs the license keys.
      Returns:
      The Widevine Drm Manager.
      Throws:
      com.penthera.exoplayer.com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.UnsupportedDrmException

      requiresSecureDecoderComponent 
      boolean requiresSecureDecoderComponent(java.lang.String mimeType)
      Whether the session requires a secure decoder for the specified mime type.
      public boolean requiresSecureDecoderComponent(java.lang.String mimeType)
      Description copied from interface: com.penthera.exoplayer.com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.DrmSessionManager
      Whether the session requires a secure decoder for the specified mime type.

      Normally this method should return MediaCrypto.requiresSecureDecoderComponent(String), however in some cases implementations may wish to modify the return value (i.e. to force a secure decoder even when one is not required).

      This method may be called when the manager is in the following states: DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED_WITH_KEYS

      Specified by:
      requiresSecureDecoderComponent in interface com.penthera.exoplayer.com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.DrmSessionManager
      Returns:
      Whether the open session requires a secure decoder for the specified mime type.
